Class RegularShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • RegularShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiRegShape

    public abstract class RegularShape
extends java.lang.Object
    RegularShape abstract superclass for regular geometric shapes. These are closed shapes where all sides and angles are congruent

    2/08

    EDITOR: tabstop=2, cols=80

    Since:
    Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0-b105
    Author:
    Kurt Schmidt

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularShape

        public RegularShape(double len,
            java.lang.String label)
        Only c'tor
        Parameters:
        len - - the length (these are all regular shapes, so, 1 dimension suffices. You had better give meaning to this dimension, for each shape).
        label - - just some label, to distinguish shapes

      • clone

        protected java.lang.Object clone()
                          throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Being careful of somebody implementing clone in an inherited class.

        Don't worry about this, even a little bit. I'm just playing, don't want to implement cloneable

        You do not need to do anything w/this.
